# Introduction and aims 
This report describes the results of the exome-sequencing of 6 tumor cell lines. This sequencing was done in order to investigate genetic alterations that cause resistance to three drugs that are targetive therapies for glioblastoma. This report details data and results for only the exome sequencing part of the study.
